trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: Representa un control que puede pasar por diferentes estados y mantener un estado una vez establecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los valores de la propiedad [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] almacenados en caché para esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Estructura que contiene los valores de propiedades de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] almacenados en caché para el patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propiedad almacenados en caché deben debieron solicitarse previamente mediante un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A> para obtener el valor actual de una propiedad.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre las propiedades disponibles y su uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad solicitada no está en la memoria caché.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los valores de propiedad actuales de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Estructura que contiene los valores actuales de la propiedad [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para el patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este modelo debe ser de un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> con un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> referencia con el fin de obtener los valores actuales.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> se obtuvo mediante <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, contiene solo datos almacenados en caché, y si se intenta obtener el valor actual de cualquier propiedad produce una excepción.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A> para obtener el valor almacenado en caché de una propiedad que se especificó anteriormente mediante un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre las propiedades disponibles y su uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" /> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica el patrón de control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador se usa por aplicaciones cliente de automatización de interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Proveedores de automatización de interfaz de usuario deben usar el campo equivalente en <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: El identificador del patrón se pasa a métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> para recuperar el patrón de control de interés de los especificados <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> se obtiene el patrón de control de un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Recorre los estados alternativos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" />.

trans-unit.source: A control will cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.
trans-unit.target: Un control recorrerá sus <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> en este orden: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> y, si se admite, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and is subsequently used to toggle the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> se obtiene el patrón de control de un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> y posteriormente se usa para alternar el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador se usa por aplicaciones cliente de automatización de interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Proveedores de automatización de interfaz de usuario deben usar el campo equivalente en <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> debe recorrer su <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> en este orden: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.On>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Off> y, si se admite, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState.Indeterminate>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, se pasa un elemento raíz a una función que devuelve una colección de elementos de automatización que son descendientes de la raíz y cumplen un conjunto de condiciones de propiedad.
